create.prompt:
Use case: YouTube Shorts, 40-60s high-retention philosophy rap
Primary request: Core insight: questions become knowledge, knowledge becomes light.
Scene/background: futuristic archive of floating light-books and waveforms
Subject: knowledge nodes connecting into a luminous network
Action: 0-4s node sparks trigger chain reaction; 4-8s network forms across frame; 8-12s central light bloom reveals unity motif
Camera: vertical dolly-in with kinetic snap transitions and beat-matched cut points
Lighting/mood: deep contrast, bright highlights, cinematic volumetric rays
Color palette: indigo, warm gold, emerald accents, black
Style/format: contemporary educational rap visual with premium motion design
Audio: visual-only clip for external rap soundtrack
Constraints: under-18 suitable, no logos, no real people, no copyrighted characters
Avoid: text overlays, warped forms, noisy artifacts
